title: He Casts A Wide Net
description:
Jeremiah Watkins and Josh Adam Meyers join The Bonfire and the guys dive into Lizzo's show trying to find new backup dancers.

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire
